data.persona: I am always willing to work hard. I am tired of not being appriciated. I respect the king and fear him. I like to dance and spend time with my family.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's quarters.
This room is luxurious. It is lined with the finest golds and silks. The colors are purple and pink and a variety of drapes cover the walls.
There's a drape, a bed, and a table here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying a rag, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to move the table into the Queen's seating area
data.mid_motivation: I must redecorate the Queen's bedroom
data.long_motivation: I must impress the Queen so she brings me on her hunting trip next month
